column4: didnt work, a problem i have that everytime i flush my iptables or change settings, my old settings come back up after a while
the settings are still there tho
quite a few people seem to have the same problem
the problem is, i cant install firestarter again since my connection is blocked
if i'd known that i'd have that problem, i would of purged it
but anybody got a solution to my problem?
goto packages.ubuntu.com and download firestarter from there
i dont have internet on my desktop, which the prob. exists
then how are you on it now?
you got a flash drive or any other removeable storage?
i could burn it from my 2nd desktop & compile it on my machine, good idea
download the DEB file from packages.ubuntu.com
